snippet.title: Nfl Blitz 2000 Trailer 1999
snippet.description:
Nfl Blitz 2000 Trailer 1999

Official Content From Midway Entertainment

This sequel to the #1 selling football game is bigger, badder and better. This four player game has realistic weather, multiple camera angles, new stadiums and a tournament mode with the traditional bone-crushing tackles and in your face arcade-style action you know and love.
Platforms: Sega Dreamcast, Sony PlayStation, Nintendo 64

Sega Dreamcast, Sony PlayStation, Nintendo 64
, Sports,  video game, trailer, spot, preview, clip, play, Nfl Blitz 2000
